select count(*) from faq
and ftitle like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and fcontent like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and ftitle like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or fcontent like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT b.*, a.fno, a.ftitle, a.fcontent FROM faq a join faqcategory b on b.fcno=a.fcno where a.fcno BETWEEN 1 AND 3
and a.ftitle like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and a.fcontent like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and a.ftitle like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or a.fcontent like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY a.fno desc LIMIT #{startRow}, 5;
SELECT b.*, a.fno, a.ftitle, a.fcontent FROM faq a join faqcategory b on b.fcno=a.fcno where a.fcno BETWEEN 1 AND 1 GROUP BY a.fno ORDER BY a.fno desc
SELECT b.*, a.fno, a.ftitle, a.fcontent FROM faq a join faqcategory b on b.fcno=a.fcno where a.fcno BETWEEN 2 AND 2 GROUP BY a.fno ORDER BY a.fno desc
SELECT b.*, a.fno, a.ftitle, a.fcontent FROM faq a join faqcategory b on b.fcno=a.fcno where a.fcno BETWEEN 3 AND 3 GROUP BY a.fno ORDER BY a.fno desc
select b.fcname, fno, ftitle, fcontent from faq as a left join faqcategory as b on a.fcno = b.fcno where fno=#{fno}
